results.title: Multi-Targeting Valproic Acid Conjugates as Potent Agents Against Inflammation and Hyperlipidemia.
results.text_hl: The effect on total and LDL cholesterol is comparable or equal to that of @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@, a @<m>DISEASE_3_Hydroxy_3_Methylglutaryl_CoA_Lyase_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538324 @@@hypocholesterolemic 3-hydroxy-3-methylglutaryl coenzyme A reductase@@@ (@<m>DISEASE_3_Hydroxy_3_Methylglutaryl_CoA_Lyase_Deficiency</m> @DISEASE_MESH:C538324 @@@HMG-CoA@@@) inhibitor, however, with additionally great @CHEMICAL_Triglycerides @CHEMICAL_MESH:D014280 @@@triglyceride@@@-decreasing effect compared to @<m>CHEMICAL_Simvastatin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D019821 @@@simvastatin@@@.

citations.NLM: Theodosis-Nobelos P, Rekka EA. Multi-Targeting Valproic Acid Conjugates as Potent Agents Against Inflammation and Hyperlipidemia. Molecules. 2025 May 27;30(11):. PMID: 40509225
